title: What should I write on my bio to show that I'm available? - Quora

response.answer_text: I am wondering from when did Quora became a dating site ! My request - please show your intentions on tinder or okcupid or etc etc. But why Quora. Why? This is a park where people love to visit to read and write, but not to meet their future boyfriend/girlfriend :P But yeah, there will be always exceptions, like in coding :D No offense :D
